titles.title: Near, So Very Near To God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Near, so very near to God. Nearer I could not be. But in the presence of His Son, I am as near as He.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dear, so very dear to God. Dearer I could not be. But in the presence of His Son, I am as dear as He.{/lang-eng}
